channel.description: Recent content in million on Blockchain Daily

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-03-01
item.description: FTX Pledges Up to $1 Billion for Philanthropic Fund to ‘Improve Humanity’ (2 minute read) Cryptocurrency exchange FTX has announced an up to $1 billion fund for ambitious projects that improve humanity’s long-term prospects.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-02-15
item.description: “Reverse ISO” will see 20 million more SundaeSwap tokens given away (2 minute read) SundaeSwap, a decentralized exchange on the Cardano blockchain, launched on January 20 and soon became the leading Cardano DEX.
